item.title: Universal Abdominal Binder | 9″ Tall / 3 Panels
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Model 219 Universal 9" Tall Abdominal Binder with 3 Panels provides moderate support and compression to abdominal muscles weakened by strain without restricting breathing or muscle redevelopment. Types of abdominal strains are defined as a mild injury to the abdominal muscles resulting from trauma, overuse, pregnancy, inactivity, or surgeries such as cesarean, liposuction, or hysterectomy.

The universal braces come in three sizes with a larger range in sizing than the alternative, giving the wearer greater versatility to find the best possible fit.

The post Universal Abdominal Binder | 9″ Tall / 3 Panels appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The Abdominal Binder is recommended for abdominal hernia reduction, postpartum recovery, bariatric support, and flattening and slimming of the abdomen. Conforms to body contour for support and proper compression, helping to speed recovery, increase circulation and reduce pain from movement or coughing.

  • Firmly holds dressings in proper position
  • Garment stays in place – won’t roll or chafe
  • Exclusive A-T Multiple Lock Stitch and high-quality fabric
  • Soft, breathable elastic (made of nylon, polyester and Lycra) ensures comfort, durability and consistent compression strength
  • Universal fit

About universal fit models:

If you aren’t sure what size you need and fall between measurements, the universal belt offers greater flexibility in accommodating a range of sizes. Rather than coming in 4 standard “true fit” sizes, our universal models come in 2 sizes (Small & Large) which are more generously cut to span across a wider range of sizes. For belts, wraps and binders, the universal model has a larger fastening panel for proper adjustment to achieve a customized fit.

Small: 30″ – 45″ | Large: 45″ – 60″ | XLarge: 60″ – 75″

The post Universal Abdominal Binder | 9″ Tall / 3 Panels appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Child’s Umbilical Truss
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Is your baby suffering from a hernia? This belt will provide a tight fit to compress the herniated area. Velcro® stays keep the belt firmly attached while a closed-cell foam insert keeps the condition from getting worse.

The post Child’s Umbilical Truss appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• This umbilical hernia belt/truss is recommended for a baby, infant or child for the relief of abdominal pain associated with an umbilical hernia
  • A foam pad adds padding and provides a non-elastic zone that helps to direct compression on the hernia
  • Cotton/elastic blend provide breathable, comfortable support. Velcro strip ensures positive closure and adjustment

Sizing:

XS: 10″ to 12″
S: 12″ to 16″
M: 16″ to 20″
L: 20″ to 24″
XL: 24″ to 28″

If your child’s abdomen measures within 1 to 2 inches of the highest width range, we suggest you order one size up.
For example, if your child’s abdomen measures 19″ or 20″, which is the top range of the medium belt (16″-20″), we suggest the large.

 

The post Child’s Umbilical Truss appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Rib Injury Binder Belt Protector Wrap For Sore, Bruised Chest Support With Abdominal Muscle Pain Treatment.
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Specifically designed to provide stabilization and support to your sore rib cage to help treat injuries and pain caused by rib fractures, sprains, and more.…

The post Rib Injury Binder Belt Protector Wrap For Sore, Bruised Chest Support With Abdominal Muscle Pain Treatment. appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Specifically designed to provide stabilization and support to your sore rib cage to help treat injuries and pain caused by rib fractures, sprains, and more. Hold the rib cage in the proper position and ensures proper posture while reducing everyday pain caused by sudden movements. This Rib Belt is prescribed for patients with injured broken ribs, and broken sternum while offering middle and upper back supports. This belt ensures superior stabilization and sustaining rib and sternum injuries. Following surgery and surgical incisions, this belt can also provide supporting pressure for the patient. Made of high-quality materials for optimal comfort and breathability.

Features:

  • Breathable bandage repeats your anatomical shape
  • Fits around your ribs precisely according to your body form
  • Effectively reduce any kind of chest pain after the local surgery or any other possible rib and sternum traumas
  • Comfortable help you to heal faster
  • Used as prevention against muscle overload during exercises
  • Designed To Treat & Protect:
  • Broken ribs
  • Sore or bruised rib cage
  • Cracked ribs
  • Intercostal muscle strain
  • Dislocated ribs

Specification:

  • Type: Belt
  • Color: White
  • Gender: Unisex
  • Body Part: Spinal Column
  • Structure: Flexible
  • Texture: Soft
  • Intended Use: Abdominal & Rib Support
  • Package includes: 1pc X Relive Rib Belt

Size

  • Size Available
  • S 27 – 32”
  • M 33 – 38”
  • L 39 – 44”
  • XL 45 – 50”

Directions: Simply wrap the rib binder around your chest directly below the breasts. Secure via Velcro closure to your desired compression level. Adjust as needed. For the women’s style, make sure the curved portion of the binder is centered underneath your breasts.

The post Rib Injury Binder Belt Protector Wrap For Sore, Bruised Chest Support With Abdominal Muscle Pain Treatment. appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Abdominal Hernia Belt for Umbilical Hernia
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• The Abdominal Hernia Belt provides significant relief from abdominal pain associated with an umbilical hernia
  • Foam pad adds rigidity, padding, and provides a non-elastic zone that helps to direct compression on the hernia
  • Cotton/elastic blend provide breathable, comfortable support
  • Dual Velcro strips ensure positive closure and adjustment

The post Abdominal Hernia Belt for Umbilical Hernia appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Measure around abdomen (belly) for a proper fit. Waist (pant) size may not be a good indicator for size as most people need to wear the belt closer to the belly and not the hips. The belt is intended to fit tight and provide compression

Sizing (Measure around hips)

S (26-30″), M (32-36″), L (38-42″) and XL (44-48″)

The post Abdominal Hernia Belt for Umbilical Hernia appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT Surgical Hernia Truss Support Belt
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgical's Hernia Trusses are made with a soft pad that applies gradual pressure and support to the weakened muscles of the groin with focused compression on the hernia. Designed to provide relief from an a reducible inguinal hernia in your groin - post or pre-surgery. The inguinal hernia truss will provide you with the support and comfort needed to maintain your active lifestyle.

The post AT Surgical Hernia Truss Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The Inguinal Hernia Truss is designed to provide relief from a reducible inguinal hernia in your groin – post or pre-surgery
  • Provides constant, comfortable and adjustable pressure to the hernia
  • Over-the-brief style of hernia support, worn inconspicuously under clothing – may be used while bathing or swimming
  • Get some relief from a reducible inguinal hernia with the inguinal/groin hernia truss
  • Easy to slip on and off
  • Made in the USA

Sizing (Measure around hips)

S (26-30″), M (32-36″), L (38-42″) and XL (44-48″)

Learn more about hernias from our hernia section on our Articles page

The post AT Surgical Hernia Truss Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
